item.title: Reaktor Breakpoint 2018 Ben Sauer, The rise of voice, and how to design for it - YouTube
item.description: This is a great overview of the sate of designing for voice. Ben is one the best designers / tech thinkers that I’ve ever worked with, and he gives a great overview of how to think about designing for voice in this talk. <a href=https://www.
